data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Steve went to the gym with a friend who had recently started working out there. He ____ surprised ____ how ____ it ____ to ____ all ____ the ____. He ____ up a ____, and ____ achieved a ____ workout ____ being ____ of ____ and ____ being ____ to ____ gym ____. He wor___ up a sw___, and rea___ achieved a gr___ workout des____ being o__ of sh___ and n__ being us__ to t__ gym equi_____. He was so happy with his workout that he decided to join the gym and become a regular there.
data.answer: 史蒂夫和一个朋友一起去健身房，他的朋友最近才开始在那里锻炼。他惊讶地发现使用所有的设备都是那么容易。他出了一身汗，尽管身材走样，也不习惯健身房的设备，但他真的得到了很好的锻炼。他对自己的锻炼非常满意，所以他决定加入健身房，成为那里的常客。
